HDG.BC.content: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready
HDG.BC.linkedContent: reflection saves us, inner choice (innere Wahl): what alone remains essence comes into view almost (fast) of itself [causa sui?], attend to what we can do w/out, choose whether or not to expose (ausgesetzt) ourselves to claim essential (Anspruch des Wesenhaften) makes on us > each person responsible for himself, for his delusions, for that which he holds himself ready

HDG.FS.content: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness
HDG.FS.linkedContent: subjectivity itself not questioned re: its being > since Descartes, subjectivity is fundamentum inconcussum, the barrier to unfolding Seinsfrage ——the “making-present-to-oneself (Selbstvergegenwärtigung)” of consciousness takes place in immanence, what I am conscious of is present to me, in my consciousness > in Being and Time, “thing” no longer in consciousness, but in the world > despite intentionality, Husserl remains trapped in immanence: Husserl retrieves proper consistency of object, saves object, but by situating it in immanence of consciousness

HDG.LP.content: soul is strange on earth (Wesen of soul), always underway, follows the draw (Zug) of its nature > earth where the soul’s wandering can’t reach, soul seeks (sucht) the earth [Schelling], such poetic wandering builds/dwells on earth, can save (retten) the earth as earth
HDG.LP.linkedContent: soul is strange on earth (Wesen of soul), always underway, follows the draw (Zug) of its nature > earth where the soul’s wandering can’t reach, soul seeks (sucht) the earth [Schelling], such poetic wandering builds/dwells on earth, can save (retten) the earth as earth

HDG.LP.content: the way apartness flames, it is spirit & thus gathering power, Das Versammelnde der Abgeschiedenheit, saves the unborn beyond the used-up for a coming rebirth of mankind, gathering power, spirit of gentleness, stills spirit of evil

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.LP.content: Trakl’s poetry doesn’t need historical objects because historical in highest sense: sings of the destiny of casts/blows (Geschick des Schlages), that which casts Menschengeschlecht away (verschlägt) in its still withheld nature [?]—i.e. saves mankind
